Improved Grapple: Grapple provokes no AOO/+4 Grapple check
Improved Overrun: Gains +4 overrun Strength check/Foe cannot avoid overrun
Improved Precise Shot: Foe gains no AC bonus for partial cover/May attack grappling target
Improved Sunder: Sunder provokes no AOO/+4 Sunder attack
Improved Trip: Trip provokes no AOO/+4 trip Strength check/May attack after trip
Improved Two-Weapon Fighting: May make second off-hand attack at -5 penalty
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Manyshot: R30' May fire up to 3 arrows simultaneously at -2 attack per arrow
Mobility: +4 AC vs. movement AOO
Mounted Archery: Suffers half normal mounted ranged weapon penalty
Mounted Combat: Successful Ride skill check (DC foe attack roll) negates mount damage 1/rd
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Power Attack: May suffer up to -12 attack for equal damage bonus
Precise Shot: Suffers no penalty on shot into melee
Rapid Shot: May make normal and extra ranged attacks at a -2 penalty
Ride-By Attack: May move before and after mounted attack w/out provoking AOO
Shot On The Run: May move before and after ranged attack
Snatch Arrows: May catch ranged weapons
Spirited Charge: x2 damage (lance x3) on mounted charge
Spring Attack: May move before and after melee attack w/out provoking AOO
Stunning Fist: Unarmed strike inflicts stunned for 1 rd 3/dy (DC 17 Fort neg)
Trample: Foe cannot avoid mounted overrun/Mount gains bonus hoof attack
Two-Weapon Defense: +1 AC when wielding two weapons; +2 when fighting defensively
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduces on-hand penalty by 2 and off-hand by 6
Whirlwind Attack: May attack all foes in reach
